definitions.definition: Having the ability or tendency to absorb ; able to soak up liquid easily; absorptive .
examples: Those paper towels were amazingly absorbent . That was quite a spill.
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the early 18 century.

main_definition: Having the ability or tendency to absorb ; able to soak up liquid easily; absorptive . [First attested in the early 18 century.]
